text:
Dr Loi is a very experienced and passionate doctor. He explained every single details to my mum before and after operation.

Nurses are very friendly and polite. Highly recommended. My mum able to walk smoothly just after 2 weeks of operation. Big thanks to Dr Loi and the team. The beds are very clean overall experience is good. üëçüèª

I did an ACL + meniscus tear surgery and Dr. Loi is very detailed and patience in explaining to me the next steps and what i need to take note on. After surgery he will still come to visit me even after 11pm when is over his work shift, just to check on my condition and made sure that I was okay.

Front desk kakak is very kind and helpful on appointment. Dr Loi has a lot of patients so remember to make your appointment early.

Dr Loi is probably one of the best doctors we know. Very patient, humble, very into details pre and post op, very very passionate and professional. My mom flew to JB from Sarawak and went through a TKR with Dr Loi, she said it was the best decision she has made. The fact that he is already so successful yet still travels non-stop to learn from different professionals, we really appreciate to have met him.
Best orthopedic surgeon ever! Dr Loi very kind, patience and understandable
